author: raz
title: Cardano impact project directory
description: Lack of awareness of Cardano4Good projects and lack of ease to locate them, in an open access database, with other blockchain4good projects.

f6_assessments.q0: Great looking site and data links. Built in creditability with legacy building on Cardano and Catalyst. I believe this is a wonderful Dapp solution the ecosystem has been looking for. The BAT token seems to be giving good utility in this manor as well. I think this will be a great addition bringing utility and use of personal data back to the users.
f6_assessments.q1: Due to the history of the proposers and details mapped into the process. I have confidence this team will continue to work to deliver this App and use case to the community. I believe it is fair for community to support a project like this with votes.
f6_assessments.q2: I believe this is a very transparent proposal with all the key points met for me. I have confidence they can implement this and they will deliver on more. Taking the financial stress off the team could accelerate adoption and team's effectiveness.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal tries to help bring the Cardano impact projects to the open access, database, and platform, which is a Positiveblockchain platform. The proposal will help in three ways, Add Cardano projects in the Positiveblockchain directory by collecting data, Fund development costs of Positiveblockchain, and Ensure onboarding of Cardano projects in the Positiveblockchain directory. The proposal has proposed a solution to an important problem on the challenge. The proposal has provided potential risks and reasonable ways to overcome them.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposal outlined clearly the roadmap and what will they do in the timeframe (three big phase consists of 3-4 months). The team provides a concise and reasonable way of how they will use the proposed budget. The team gives details information of background, relevant skills, and experience for each team member. Furthermore, all team member also has a LinkedIn profile that can be checked for further information for community
f6_assessments.q2: Metrics for success are concise and clearly defined by the number of projects added to PB, Number of claimed projects by Cardano project owners on PB, among others. The indicators of success are also concise and clearly defined by three points.

f6_assessments.q0: By eliminating the middlemen, as well as replacing the manual processes left in the transaction, I find this proposal to be able to process transactions significantly faster than conventional methods that help bring the system to a close. The Cardano 4 Good ecosystem reaches a wider audience and creates a multitude of opportunities, such as those that can come from a partnership. This is really great. The Positiveblockchain system is a directory of projects across multiple technologies, based on a blockchain environment that can process transactions quickly, so the project will help boost Cardano's visibility to other players. Using Positiveblockchain will help the Cardano ecosystem grow a lot faster. Therefore I strongly agree with this proposal.
f6_assessments.q1: The plans in the proposal are quite good, and the time to provide solutions is also reasonable. Short-term and long-term goals should also be suggested. The members involved in the project are also listed in full details, with links. And there are also quite a few talented members participating. In my opinion the success rate will be higher.
f6_assessments.q2: I found that the team that identified detailed specific progress measures in the proposal and the success of the proposal also gave specific to-to-go numbers. There are clear examples by links.

f6_assessments.q0:
The Cradano is world leader at leading Technologies and projects and funding's,
Still it has been lacking in coordination and information sharing , As Cardano working on many projects for people, Still awareness is lacking on projects, Having hard time finding and locating them in open data bases and even other blockchain projects.
..
By developing new users and giving them awareness and  project owner functionalities on the Positiveblockchain platform, And also inviting ADA projects for claiming them fully,
The proposer Idea is great,
 As Positiveblockchain is a directory of projects across multiple blockchain technologies and environments, the project will help foster visibility of Cardano to other players and enable more (crosschain) collaborations.
This proposal effectively addresses the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposer experience being worked in Positiveblockchain and Sustainable ADA related projects  ,
As currently more than 500 projects already in the Positiveblockchain database is impressive,
As there goal is to provide support  the development of the Positiveblockchain platform in its own way in  Blockchain for Good space, and bring the Cardano impact projects to the open access, database and platform is great idea,

..
As they already have solution for creating impact through social media, communities, campaign approach to identifying them ,
They have addressed everything correctly,
With Given experience and plan presented it is highly likely this proposal will be implemented successfully.
f6_assessments.q2:
As they will be providing Cardano projects in the Positiveblockchain directory by collecting data and recordings in May to june,
development costs of Positiveblockchain in June to September, Ensuring onboarding of Cardano projects in the Positiveblockchain  in September to December,

They Have provided detailed budget plan and requreiment, which includes  development costs of Positiveblockchain,


they have impressive team and all working experience in  development and managing PB,

For Auditing they will be providing Number of projects added to PB,
Number of data fields on average per project, Number of claimed projects by Cardano project owners on PB,
which is more than enough to audit the progress,

The project having target of 50 projects identified and listed on the PB platform  is impressive for end sucess,
The information provided is sufficient to audit the progress and the success of the proposal.

solution: Developing new users and project owner functionalities on the Positiveblockchain platform + inviting Cardano projects to claim their pages.
experience: Positiveblockchain and Sustainable ADA are already involved in a research project working on a sub-set of 500 projects already in the Positiveblockchain database, together with the French University Paris Dauphine.
